{"id":1030197422,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1692855328,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"7 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1030197422/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Second Largest Digit in a String","memory":"7.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int secondHighest(string s) {\n        vector<int> t;\n        for (size_t i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            if (isdigit(s[i]))\n                t.push_back(s[i] - '0');\n        }\n        sort(t.begin(), t.end());\n        vector<int>::iterator it = unique(t.begin(), t.end());\n        t.resize(std::distance(t.begin(), it));\n        if (t.size() < 2)\n            return -1;\n        return t[t.size() - 2];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"second-largest-digit-in-a-string","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
